longBusinessSummary: Arata Corporation engages in the wholesale of daily goods, cosmetics, household goods, pet supplies, and others in Japan. The company offers health and beauty products, including cosmetics, hair and body care, oral care, pharmaceuticals, and health foods; household detergents, such as clothing detergents, home-related cleaners, and dishwashing and kitchen detergents; home care products, including insecticides, air fresheners and Recording media and deodorizers, lighting supplies, electrical application products, OA supplies, photo-related products, and batteries; paper products, which include tissues, toilet paper, and disposable diapers; and household goods comprising Kitchen consumables, toiletries, cleaning supplies, storage supplies, seasonal products, preservation supplies, cooking supplies, tabletop supplies, vacation supplies. It is also involved in the retail, wholesale, and import/export sale of pets, and pet food and accessories, as well as sells pet-related products online; pet styling and grooming activities; recruiting of franchised stores; and store management activities, as well as research and development of pet shop franchise systems; operation of pet hotels; and manufacturing and sale of cosmetics. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
